import React from 'react' import { Toast } from 'react-bootstrap'; import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; function Profile() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [error, setError] = React.useState(""); if (email === "" || password === "") { setError("Please fill all fields"); return; } const navigateToDashboard = () => { navigate('/dashboardproxi') } const notifyProfile= ()=> toast('Profile Updated') function functionWrapperB (){ notifyProfile(); } return (
